name: Smore Amoeba 1.1
description: Smore Amoeba is a top-down survival game on a microscopic level, playing as a single-celled organism who is stuck in a perpetual loop of the circle of life as you grow from eating harmless creatures but lose the growth as you progress the levels. Watch out for the harmful spike creatures though, it gets tougher to dodge them as you grow a bit larger!
